participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is an energetic and creative individual who loves to express herself through fashion and music.
participant_1.background: i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i am a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and has a quirky sense of humor. He enjoys immersing himself in fantasy worlds through role-playing games.
participant_2.background: on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i drive a ford pinto. i play a lot of call of duty. i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.
